channel.title: Homes on Bruna Wundervald
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Bruna Wundervald

item.description: About me I’m a Statistician and reproducible research enthusiast. An R and GIT lover and active user. I like statistical modelling in general, package and dashboards building, text mining and APIs. Also, I’m specially interested in multivariate analysis, feature extraction, probabilistic graphical models and data science. Projects As as I am very interested in Music Information Retrieval, I developed, so far, two packages for R: vagalumeR, which is about lyrics data extraction, and chorrrds, a package that extracts music chords from the CifraClub website.

item.title: Packages
item.description: Currently, I have two packages on CRAN vagalumeR chorrrds They have the same subject: music data. vagalumeR is the package that extracts music lyrics from the Vagalume API. The second package, chorrrds, extracts music chords from the CifraClub website, through web scraping. Both these packages are in constantly development, are their most recent ones will be always available first at my github.
